availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: M. B. Pearce (Henry County county court clerk)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, attorney and county court clerk. Kentucky native. Attorney in Henry County in 1862, 1863, and 1864. County court clerk in Henry County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 11, Henry County, Kentucky, 1862, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 09, Henry County, Kentucky, 1863, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 10, Henry County, Kentucky, 1865, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year ending October 10, 1864,” Legislative Document No. 1, in Kentucky Public Documents (Frankfort, KY: State Printing Office, 1865), 11.
